original_title: No Room For Mistakes! High-Alpine MTB in the Dolomites with Tom Oehler
overview: Taking "on the edge" to a whole new stratosphere. Follow Austrian trials mountain biker, Tom Oehler, on his mission through the Dolomites, taking on the most exposed and extreme MTB trails he could find. Why not take your bike on a via ferrata right?
title: No Room For Mistakes! High-Alpine MTB in the Dolomites with Tom Oehler
